mapper.insert: insert into board( user_id, category_id, title, description, date_created, date_modified, hit, image_url )values( #{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{description}, now(), now(), 0, #{imageUrl} )
mapper.select: select b.id as "id", c.name as "categoryName", u.name as "userName", u.image_url as "userImageUrl", b.title as "title", b.description as "description", UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.date_created)*1000 as "dateCreated", UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.date_modified)*1000 as "dateModified", b.hit as "hit" from board b left join category c on b.category_id = c.id left join user u on b.user_id = u.id where b.id = #{id}

select b.id as "id", c.name as "categoryName", u.name as "userName", u.image_url as "userImageUrl", b.title as "title", b.description as "description", UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.date_created)*1000 as "dateCreated", UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.date_modified)*1000 as "dateModified", b.hit as "hit" from board b left join category c on b.category_id = c.id left join user u on b.user_id = u.id
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit+1 where id = #{id}
update board set category_id = #{categoryId}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, date_modified = now() where id = #{id}
